version_description:
Thank you for using Aurora Reader! This update includes new features and bug fixes.

• Added 3D Touch previewing. You can now use 3D Touch on reading list to preview articles and perform quick actions
• Added a new button on reading list for import weblink
• Improved Safari definition view
- Add quick actions
- Fixed a problem that cause Tap to Look Up failed to activate on some devices
• Other UI updates

If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us by sending an email to lightscreen.app@gmail.com

If you enjoy Aurora Reader, please consider leaving a positive review on App Store, thank you :)

Thank you for using Aurora Reader! This update includes new features and bug fixes.

• Added multiple new features and enhancements for Article Reader
- Optimized format of code block, and supports scroll horizontally to view completed code
- Optimized format of table view
- Optimized format of quote sentences
- Decrease the font size of captions and footnotes
- Images now display within round rectangles
- Supported load web inner frames

• Supported save GIF images to iOS Photo Library

• Added batch deletion UI for history articles

If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us by sending an email to lightscreen.app@gmail.com

If you enjoy Aurora Reader, please consider leaving a positive review on App Store, thank you :)

• Updated for iPhone XS Max

Aurora Reader 2.0 is here! 

Highlights & Notes
• Aurora Reader backup and sync all of your highlights and notes via iCloud, automatically
• Customize your highlights with 6 vivid colors
• The new Notes tab is easy to reach, and let you view all of your highlights and notes in one place

Additional new features and improvements
• Enabled full screen experience on the new iPad Pro
• Simplified onboarding experience
• A new Today widget that shows your recent saved articles
• New home screen quick actions for quickly jump to different in-app UI
• Bottom toolbar on article view are now slidable, and let you easily switch tools
• Improved performance for definition look up
• On iPhone, definition views now always shown above your selected words, so you can always close them easily with just a swipe up

Additional bug fixes
• Resolved an issue on iOS 12 that cause incomplete definitions on some words
• Resolved some frame drop issues for article view
• Fixed an issue that cause weblinks hard to selected on some devices
• Fixed an issue that cause Reader Action extension always failed to show multiple article views for multiple input URLs

Highlights & Notes
• Aurora Reader backup and sync all of your highlights and notes via iCloud, automatically
• Customize your highlights with 6 vivid colors
• The new Notes tab is easy to reach, and let you view all of your highlights and notes in one place

Additional new features and improvements
• Enabled full screen experience on the new iPad Pro
• Simplified onboarding experience
• A new Today widget that shows your recent saved articles
• New home screen quick actions for quickly jump to different in-app UI
• Bottom toolbar on article view are now slidable, and let you easily switch tools
• Improved performance for definition look up
• On iPhone, definition views now always shown above your selected words, so you can always close them easily with just a swipe up

Additional bug fixes
• Resolved an issue on iOS 12 that cause incomplete definitions on some words
• Resolved some frame drop issues for article view
• Fixed an issue that cause weblinks hard to selected on some devices

• New: Use Face ID, Touch ID or device passcode to unlock Aurora Reader
• Improvement: Reader extension now shows explanation when no URL can be found in shared content
• Fix: Newly archived articles occasionally restored to unarachive state

Introducing Membership Sharing: Share your current annual membership with one of your family member, for free. If you upgrade to the new Annual Membership - Family plan, you can share your membership with up to six family members.

• Membership Sharing: share your current annual membership with one of your family member, for free. If you upgrade to the new Annual Membership - Family plan, you can share your membership with up to six family members.

Aurora Reader 3.0 including 50+ feature improvements, and 3 exciting new features: Search, Organize, and Listen.

SEARCH
• Rewind your reading journey with Search
• Search saved articles, notes, folders and more from iOS home screen or in-app search bar
• Accurately locate sentences and paragraphs with Full-Text Search

ORGANIZE
• Organize your articles and notes with Folders
• Enjoy the freedom to create unlimited folders and subfolders
• Quickly find your folders with Search
• Use Drag & Drop to move and reorder your folders, articles and notes

LISTEN
• Listen to articles with high fidelity voice, hands-free and eyes-free
• Check currently reading paragraph on in-app Now Playing view. Find some unfamiliar words? just tap to look up
• Listen with just your Apple Watch (requires watchOS 5.0 or later, and a pair of Bluetooth headphones)
• Switch between multiple speech languages and voices
